interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: lorelo 20 pieces Hair Curlers, Hair Rollers Spiral Curls Styling Kit No Heat Hair Curlers with Styling Hooks for Girls Woman Review Date: 2020/08/09 Store: lorelo Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Number of Items': '20', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'Lorelo', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '10.59 x 9.02 x 2.8 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '619156721396'} Review Text: Perfect for curling hair the heartless way! The application stick is very long so it can be very useful to long hair types and the application can be adjusted to shorted types by removing a layer. Easy application as well! For application:
-slide hook side first through the roller while it is stretched out
-make sure when you slide it through the hook is showing as well as the bottom of the tool so you can pull it easy off your hair
-hook a small section of your hair (start at the root)
- once your hair is hooked hold the top of the curler gently and the bottom of the tool and gently pull your hair through until the entire hook is out and your hair is covered by the curler.
-and your done! (For best results leave it on overnight if you can!)
Hope this helps anyone! ❤️ Review Title: Perfect Heatless Curling tool! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
COSYMAY 20 inch Human Hair Wig for Women Long Black Wig with Bangs 4x4 Lace Closure Straight Wig Brazilian Virgin Hair Full Wig Average Size 1B COSYMAY {'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'COSYMAY', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.96 x 6.73 x 2.72 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '738627428647'} [[VIDEOID:9118ad20b0e9a447f9b3a276479f331c]] Wow! This hair is gorgeous! Very nice thickness for a 20 inch and silky to the touch with so much body. The closure is perfect on this wig as well! Just to give you guys an idea of the body of this hair I uploaded videos but excuse me for still having my edges wrapped up lol Silky and Quality Hair! Senegalese Twist Crochet Hair Extensions Ombre-Brown - 32inch 8Packs Synthetic Crochet Braids Pre Looped Crochet Hair Synthetic Braiding Hair (32 inch, T30) ToyoTree {'Package Dimensions': '16.5 x 7.2 x 2.1 inches; 1.6 Pounds', 'UPC': '781827816141'} [[VIDEOID:a3e393606a2e6dcef86b83ecc97fa694]] These are a very nice quality synthetic hair but they are small so I’d you’re going for a more fuller look I suggest getting more but if you’re going to space your crochets quite a bit or do individuals with these you should be okay. Very long too, but it’s great they give you a free gift of the crochet needle and jewels so no need for a store trip! Nice Quality Twist But May Need More Packs! lorelo 20 pieces Hair Curlers, Hair Rollers Spiral Curls Styling Kit No Heat Hair Curlers with Styling Hooks for Girls Woman lorelo {'Number of Items': '20', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'Lorelo', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '10.59 x 9.02 x 2.8 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '619156721396'} Perfect for curling hair the heartless way! The application stick is very long so it can be very useful to long hair types and the application can be adjusted to shorted types by removing a layer. Easy application as well! For application:
-slide hook side first through the roller while it is stretched out
-make sure when you slide it through the hook is showing as well as the bottom of the tool so you can pull it easy off your hair
-hook a small section of your hair (start at the root)
- once your hair is hooked hold the top of the curler gently and the bottom of the tool and gently pull your hair through until the entire hook is out and your hair is covered by the curler.
-and your done! (For best results leave it on overnight if you can!)
Hope this helps anyone! ❤️ Perfect Heatless Curling tool!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** Strong interest in wigs, particularly long, straight styles with bangs, and a growing preference for crochet hair extensions. Recently expanded interest to hair styling tools, particularly heatless curlers.
- **Quality Expectations:** High standards for hair quality, prioritizing silkiness, thickness, and body; appreciates good quality synthetic options and innovative products that align with these standards.
- **Brand Familiarity:** Positive experiences with specific brands and loyalty to favorites, while remaining open to exploring new brands, as shown by recent purchases.
- **Visual Engagement:** Actively shares multimedia content (videos) to express satisfaction with products, indicating a commitment to community engagement and personal experience sharing.
- **Attention to Detail:** Values specific product features and practical applications, with a focus on usability and effectiveness. Recent review covers practical tips and application techniques for styling tools.
- **User Engagement Style:** Enthusiastic and expressive in feedback, providing personal experiences and helpful tips to assist others in product usage.
- **Rating Trends:** Generally positive ratings for products that meet or exceed expectations, reflecting an appreciation for quality and functionality in both hair products and styling tools.

Overall, the user displays a clear preference for high-quality, aesthetically pleasing hair options and effective styling tools, with a proactive approach to sharing experiences and insights within the beauty community.
